markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Flower Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=3954) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ghoran" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=352" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 38</row>

</column>

---

Certain magics in the world flow easily through your sap. You can cast [_barkskin_](/Spells.aspx?ID=20) and [_tree shape_](/Spells.aspx?ID=342) as 2nd-level arcane innate spells once per day each. A _tree shape_ spell you cast this way transforms you into a Large flowering plant like a rosebush or lilac bush instead of a tree.
name: Flower Magic

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 9" pfs="Standard" > Flower Magic Source Impossible Lands pg. 38 --- Certain magics in the world flow easily through your sap. You can cast barkskin and tree shape as 2nd-level arcane innate spells once per day each. A tree shape spell you cast this way transforms you into a Large flowering plant like a rosebush or lilac bush instead of a tree.
